lines.text: Hey, watch out!
What's the matter?
You almost knocked me off the ladder!
No, I didn't!
Yes you did; I almost fell!
Don't exaggerate.
I'm not.
Yeah, right.
Are you trying to pick a fight?
Will you get out of my face?
Well, you're always in my space!

[singing]
Every time we get into the car, it's so much work! It takes us twenty minutes while you're driving me berserk with your playing und your jumping und your running all about! When I finally get you inside, you always lock me out!

[singing]
Are we there yet? I'm tired. I'm hungry. How far? My nose is snotty, need to move my body, gotta use the potty, Better stop the car.
That's my toothbrush!
No, it's not!
Well, it's sitting in my slot.
No it isn't; this is mine and that one's yours.
Well, you're standing in my way!
Yeah, that's tough!

[singing]
Every time we take a trip, It's always just the same With the fighting und the biting Und the calling all those names. Then there's pushing und there's shoving und there's scratching on the neck. When we finally get to where we're going everyone's a wreck!
Yak yak yak yak yak yak yak yak yak yak yak yak yak!
